Package Yuconz.authApp.Search

Class Db

  • java.lang.Object
    • Yuconz.authApp.Search.Db
  • public class Db
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects to the DB and retrieves all information that is not associated with the current logged in user.
    Author:
    Tsotne
